sentence.Network_en: North Vietnamese stonewalling doomed Cambodia, however, to prolonged agony.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而北越人的拖延战术却使柬埔寨惨遭长期的磨难.

sentence.Network_en: He used the occasion to clear the books on Cambodia.
sentence.Network_cn: 他利用这次机会解释了有关柬埔寨问题.

sentence.Network_en: He had been run out of Cambodia for the same business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因同样原因被逐出高棉.
